original_title: Sony hikes PlayStation 5 prices in US as tariff uncertainty weighs | CNN Business
article_summary: Sony raises PlayStation 5 console prices in the US by around $50 due to tariffs and market recovery, with the PS5 Pro expected to cost $749.99. This move follows similar price increases by rival Xbox and could impact the growth of the video game market, particularly with the delay of "Grand Theft Auto VI."</s>
